entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Nakusp
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:54 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.2°C

Humidity: 94 %

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
